<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set the column type to translated_text for sam seeded data so it can get translated when one of the supported international languages are activated in a ServiceNow instance.</description>
        <name>Allow sam seeded data to be translatable</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function setColumnTypeToTranslatedText(tableName, columnNames) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
	gr.addQuery('element', columnNames);
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', '!=', 'translated_text');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_text');
	gr.updateMultiple();
}

function updateSamSeededData() {
	setColumnTypeToTranslatedText('samp_sw_license_metric', ['name', 'description']);
	setColumnTypeToTranslatedText('samp_oracle_option_set', ['oracle_option']);
	setColumnTypeToTranslatedText('samp_sw_product_classification',
		['function_description', 'unspsc_title', 'unspsc_description']);
	setColumnTypeToTranslatedText('samp_group', ['name']);
}

updateSamSeededData();]]></script>
